text: Colobothea poecila is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Ernst Friedrich Germar in 1824. It is known from Argentina, Brazil, and Paraguay.BioLib.cz - Colobothea poecila. Retrieved 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1824
title: Colobothea poecila
